messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-ComfyRun?
ComfyUI-ComfyRun provides an easy way to run and share any ComfyUI workflow.
What is the prerequisite for installing ComfyUI-ComfyRun?
To install ComfyUI-ComfyRun, you need to have the latest version of ComfyUI-Manager installed with the experimental Snapshots feature.
How can you install ComfyUI-ComfyRun from ComfyUI-Manager?
To install ComfyUI-ComfyRun from ComfyUI-Manager, click on Custom Nodes on the ComfyUI menu and search for ComfyRun.
What are the steps to deploy a local workflow to the cloud using ComfyRun?

To deploy a local workflow to the cloud using ComfyRun: 1. Create a free account on https://comfyrun.com. 2. Copy your Share key from https://comfyrun.com/account. 3. Click on Share via ComfyRun on the ComfyUI menu. 4. Enter your Share key and a title for the workflow, and click Upload workflow. 5. ComfyRun will deploy your workflow to the cloud and return a URL where anyone can easily run it online or locally.
How can you import and run an online workflow locally using ComfyRun?

To import and run an online workflow locally using ComfyRun: 1. Click on Import from ComfyRun on the ComfyUI menu. 2. Enter the workflow URL that you want to run locally. 3. Click Import workflow. 4. ComfyRun will download the workflow and all of its necessary files, so that you can easily run it locally on your computer. 5. Restart ComfyUI before running the imported workflow.
